metadata.title: Implement Billing Hour Aware Worker Termination

story.iWant: workers kept alive until billing hour ends
story.soThat: hourly costs are amortized across maximum jobs

story-context.acceptanceCriteria: 1. Given** worker is provisioned at time T 2. When** worker completes all jobs 3. Then** orchestrator checks: `current_time < T + 1 hour`? 4. And** if yes, keep worker alive (idle) 5. And** if no, terminate worker via Hetzner API 6. And** worker record marked as terminated in database
